languages.text: "Могла бы"{n}, — Джай осекается, и {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментированный{/g} кулак с жалким скрипом смыкается и размыкается вновь, — {/n}"если бы Футфол не загребла себе Ее Великолепие Инцендия Чорда".

traits.locale_text: "Могла бы" {n}, — Джай осекается, и {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментированный{/g} кулак с жалким скрипом смыкается и размыкается вновь, -{/n} "если бы Футфол не загребла себе Ее Великолепие Инцендия Чорда".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."
languages.original_text: "Могла бы"{n}, — Джай осекается, и {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментированный{/g} кулак с жалким скрипом смыкается и размыкается вновь, — {/n}"если бы Футфол не загребла себе Ее Великолепие Инцендия Чорда".

traits.locale_text: "Or would have allowed"{n}, — Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist with a pathetic squeal, —{/n} "had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Or would have allowed"{n}, — Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist with a pathetic squeal, —{/n} "had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “或者说，一切本该是这样的——”{n}婕伊断断续续地说着，不断地攥紧她带有{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的拳头，她的手发出了可怜的吱嘎声。{/n}“——如果落脚港没有落入因森蒂娅·库尔达大人手中的话。”
languages.original_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."

traits.locale_text: “或者说，一切本该是这样的——”{n}婕伊断断续续地说着，不断地攥紧她带有{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的拳头，她的手发出了可怜的吱嘎声。{/n}“——如果落脚港没有落入因森蒂娅·库尔达大人手中的话。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her augmented fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."

languages.text: «O así habría sido...». {n}Jae deja la frase en el aire mientras abre y cierra su puño {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentado{/g}, que emite un chillido lastimero.{/n} «... De no ser porque Paso ha quedado bajo el control de su magnificencia Incendia Chorda».
languages.original_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."

traits.locale_text: «O así habría sido...». {n}Jae deja la frase en el aire mientras abre y cierra su puño {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentado{/g}, que emite un chillido lastimero.{/n} «... De no ser porque Paso ha quedado bajo el control de su magnificencia Incendia Chorda».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あるいは、許されていたなら…」{n}ジェイは、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強された{/g}拳を握ったり解いたりして言葉を切った。{/n}「…フットフォールがインセンディア・チョーダに奪われていなければ」
languages.original_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."

traits.locale_text: 「あるいは、許されていたなら…」{n}ジェイは、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強された{/g}拳を握ったり解いたりして言葉を切った。{/n}「…フットフォールがインセンディア・チョーダに奪われていなければ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Oder hätte ..." {n}Jae hält inne, ballt und öffnet ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentierte{/g} Faust, die jämmerlich quietscht.{/n} "Oder wäre Footfall nicht von ihrer Erhabenheit Incendia Chorda erobert worden."
languages.original_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."

traits.locale_text: "Oder hätte ..."{n} Jae hält inne, ballt und öffnet ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentierte{/g} Faust, die jämmerlich quietscht.{/n} "Oder wäre Footfall nicht von ihrer Erhabenheit Incendia Chorda erobert worden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Du moins, cela aurait été le cas... » {n}Jae s'interrompt, fermant et rouvrant son poing {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmenté{/g} qui produit un crissement pitoyable.{/n} « ... si Sa Magnificence Incendia Chorda ne s'était pas emparée de Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."

traits.locale_text: « Du moins, cela aurait été le cas... » {n}Jae s'interrompt, fermant et rouvrant son poing {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmenté{/g} qui produit un crissement pitoyable.{/n} « ... si Sa Magnificence Incendia Chorda ne s'était pas emparée de Castel. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Verebileceğinden daha doğrusu." {n}Jae, sözünü yarıda kesiyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentli{/g} yumruğunu sıkıp gevşeterek hüzünlü bir gıcırtı çıkarıyor.{/n} "Majesteleri İncendia Chorda, Binliman'ı hâkimiyeti altına almasaydı."
languages.original_text: "Or would have allowed—" {n}Jae breaks off, clenching and unclenching her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} fist, which lets out a pitiful squeak.{/n} "—had Footfall not been claimed by Her Magnificence Incendia Chorda."

traits.locale_text: "Verebilirdi daha doğrusu." {n}Jae sözünü yarıda kesiyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogment{/g}li yumruğunu sıkıp gevşeterek hüzünlü bir gıcırtı çıkarıyor.{/n} "Majesteleri Incendia Chorda, Binliman'ı hâkimiyeti altına almasaydı."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
